articles.description: Last season's Premier League’s top six entered the Carabao Cup in the third round and, following the midweek fixtures, all eyes are on who is involved in the next stage
articles.content:
The draw for the Carabao Cup fourth round will take place this week following the conclusion of the third-round fixtures. 
You can follow it live here.

articles.title: Semifinal hero Pandya 'devastated, gutted, hurt' after India's T20 World Cup exit - OTV News
articles.description: Hardik played a sensational knock (63 off 33) to propel India to a decent 168/6 in 20 overs
articles.content: Star all-rounder Hardik Pandya on Thursday said that he is "Devastated, gutted, hurt" after India suffered a crushing 10-wicket loss to England in the second semifinal of the Men's T20 World Cup 2022… [+1027 chars]

articles.description: The beaming smile on the face of Alex Hales said it all as he and Jos Buttler strolled off the Adelaide Oval pitch, accompanied by the sound of cheers from the England fans.

articles.title: Hamstring injury puts Keegan Petersen out of Australia tour - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: Batter suffered the injury during the CSA T20 Challenge final and will take six to eight weeks to recover
articles.content: The Australian tour will be the second series Keegan Petersen will miss since his Test debut  •  Getty Images
